plot: Somewhere in Middle America, 1907: Maria II, the daugther of an Irish terrorist, meets after the dead of her father Maria I, the singer of an circus. She decided to stay with the circus. On...
title: ¡Viva María!

cast.role: Maria Fitzgerald O'Malley aka Maria II
